sentences.sentence: For them, the right kind of gamification might be turning their sales pitches into a competition with other team members, complete with a digital leaderboard showing who is winning at all times.
sentences.translation: 对他们来说，正确的游戏化可能是把他们的推销辞令变成与其他团队成员的竞争，并附上一个数字排行榜，以显示谁一直是赢家。
